sentences.sContent: Police attempts to infiltrate neo-Nazi groups were largely unsuccessful.
sentences.sCn: 警方想打入新纳粹团体的行动基本上不成功。

remMethod.val: in(进入) + filtr(过滤) + ate → 过滤进去 → 渗透， 渗入

trans.tranOther: to secretly join an organization or enter a place in order to find out information about it or harm it
